briefTitle: Breast Cancer Screening With MRI in Women Aged 50-75 Years With Extremely Dense Breast Tissue: the DENSE Trial
officialTitle: Breast Cancer Screening With MRI in Women Aged 50-75 Years With Extremely Dense Breast Tissue: the DENSE Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The number of interval cancers will be compared between the MRI group and the control group
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Dutch breast cancer screening participants, aged 50-75 years
* \> 75% mammographic density
* Negative mammographic examination (BIRADS 1 or 2)

Exclusion Criteria:

Contraindications for MRI

* The presence of intracorporeal metals
* Adverse reaction to a (gadolinium-based) contrast agent in the past
* Severely impaired renal function (GFR \< 40 mL/min)
* Pregnant or lactating women
* Claustrophobia
* Adiposity (\> 150 kg)
